pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.6: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ pahāraṁ dentī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dassantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.9: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dassatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.15.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ dadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.1.10: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā antamaso uppalapattenapi pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.4: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
